website_summaries.verdict: This adorable caddy is a perfect pick for parents wanting a quality product while saving a few dollars.
pros: Features 3 larger interior pockets and 8 exterior pockets for maximum organization
Buyers appreciate the cute fabric design
cons: Tends to lose its shape over time
Some users felt the product was flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for diapers, a container of wipes, extra burp cloths, diaper cream and baby powder. We keep it downstairs so we have easy access to these items without having to go back up to the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Holds everything you need to tote from room ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Holds everything you need to tote from room to room for baby. Extra clothes, receiving blankets, lots of diapers almost a whole bag of newborn and a full size wipes container. No more running for forgotten items in the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Adk Mama

customer_reviews.title: I love that it's fabric so it can stretch a little ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I do all of our daughter's diaper changes in the living room (because honestly, who even has time to go upstairs to their kid's room just to change a diaper). I bought this organizer tote to keep all the essentials nearby and it works perfectly! It has lived on our couch for a year and still looks brand new. I love that it's fabric so it can stretch a little to accommodate more diapers and can also be smushed into the closet when company comes over. Great go- to baby shower gift if you fill it with baby toiletries!
customer_reviews.author: christina l.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me :) I have this packed and on the coffee table shelf (our changing table is in our master room) so its a convenient back up if grandma is over or I'm too lazy (I'm pregnant again) to walk all the way back there. I though this was silly during my last pregnancy because we have a changing table but I am glad I bought this. It works great for keeping things organized and has plenty of little pockets for everything we need on hand. Good quality as well, we have been using this for at least 4 months and it hasn't torn or had any loose seems. Is holding up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: holds everything I need it to
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice diaper and baby item caddy. It holds more than I expected it would. I like being able to bring everything I might need downstairs so I’m not running back and fourth to the bedroom or having to buy duplicates of all the baby items. The quality is good for the price but I’m not sure it would last through daily use for more than a couple years without at least needing repairs. It has lots of pockets and the handles are sturdy so even when it’s full of wipes, creams, lotions, and spare outfits in addition to diapers it’s easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing diapering supplies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little diaper caddy that is perfect if you need to store diapering supplies in other areas of the house other than just the nursery. We bought this so we could keep diapering supplies on each floor of the house vs walking up and down stairs just to grab a diaper. It has space for diapers, wipes, diaper cream, aspirator, etc. It is well made and has a cute little chevron pattern. This would be the perfect baby shower gift packed with supplies for the new mom!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine T

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy construction- divider held in by flimsy loops
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't thrilled with this caddy to start with because it is very soft and floppy. Then after about a month of use, the elastic loops that hold the dividers in place snapped and there isn't a good way to repair them. So now it's just a floppy box with handles. I would recommend a product with permanent dividers, or at least with removable dividers held in place by Velcro or something other than thin elastic loops.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my mother in law to help with ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law to help with watching the baby. It fits everything she needs and can take it with her anywhere in the house. It fit a row of diapers on one side and a pack of wipes on the other. In the other sections she has powder and diaper rash cream and a roll of toilet paper. In the pockets she keeps burp rags and wash clothes and lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Beckstar

customer_reviews.title: Handy caddie for storing & relocating morning essentials.
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing to hold my am/pm routine stuff so I can tuck it all in the cabinet when I'm done and take it to another space as needed. The big compartments in the middle hold my hair care products, deodorant and perfume, and facial care products. The small pockets around the outside hold my eye liners, lip colors, mascaras, and small tools like nail files, eyelash curler, tweezers, etc. The one thing I wish it came with is a hard bottom. I cut a piece of cardboard to fit into mine before I installed the partitions and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole in CA

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is pretty flimsy, the middle sections are just held up by buttons and little elastic bands. Within 2 weeks one of the elastics already broke so now the divider isn't attached anymore. I wouldn't recommend this product, it's just not sturdy enough. It's a good size caddy for diapers, wipes, diaper creams, changing pads, etc but it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. I like that it's a little bigger than the Eddie Bauer one I have, and I like the handles but it's very flimsy. The divider inside attaches with 3 buttons and comes undone all the time. If this just had a little more structure to it, it would be perfect. I definitely think a diaper caddy is a must have item with a new baby. At first I didn't think I'd ever use it, but now I can't do without one.
customer_reviews.author: la78

customer_reviews.title: So great, we have two!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect caddy for the living room or any mobile changing station in the home. We now keep one in the living room and one in my toddler's room. For us, I put two rows of diapers, wipes, lotion, diaper cream, diaper cream spatula and finger nail clippers. On the outside, I keep a thermometer. I think it looks decent when left out and it holds its shape very well while also being flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: interior adjustable dividers are annoying
customer_reviews.text: As far as durability, I can’t be sure yet. Have only been using the product for 2 months. So far so good. However, I don’t like the way the removable dividers are attached to the caddy. The button attachments are annoying - they don’t stay attached. And because the caddy itself isn’t rigid, the interior inserts don’t provide enough stability to make it rigid - whether still fully attached or not. Not a fan in that sense. However, 3 stars because it does get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Stores everything baby needs in one place
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We use on our main floor to store all of baby’s diaper needs and an extra set of clothes. FYI OXO wipe dispenser is a little big for the section, but we make it work by not buttoning the section divider in place and allow it to move freely. Regular wipes in OEM plastic packaging fit perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: JMoh

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A FREAKING LIFESAVER. do yourself a favor...GET THIS
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and get this. I use one section for diaper change, one section for feeding storage and one section for bath. Once I am at home it goes everywhere the baby goes, saves me a lot of time running around looking for stuff. I even keep hygiene stuff and thermometer on the side pockets along with q tips and extra bibs and the handle also serve as a place where i can hang the pacifier holder. AND IT WASHABLE
customer_reviews.author: SPaces

customer_reviews.title: Soft shaped caddy - but that's a plus!
customer_reviews.text: I totally understand how people don't like how "floppy" and unsturdy this caddy is. I may have liked something firmer but there really aren't many options out there for this purpose. I think this is a great caddy with plenty of storage options on the outside of the caddy and the right divisions of space inside the caddy to hold diapers, burp cloths, wipes, and random stuff. Honestly, I think I'm going to appreciated the soft and flexible shape of this caddy since it will conform to whatever I put in it. The biggest plus that I find with this caddy is that the handles don't get in the way of getting the stuff from inside the caddy.
customer_reviews.author: hbhalala

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper tote!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tote! As a mom of my 3rd baby, I decided to go with this tote instead of a diaper stacker and it was the best choice ever! I am always changing the baby in random areas of the house so this tote goes with the baby and I around the house! I keep the wipes and some lotion in it. It fits perfectly on my night stand! Oh and it’s also super cute with that chevron pattern! It holds about 30-40 diapers and 1 box of wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this before we got a changing table to carry about the house with diapers. That plan lasted about a week and we purchased a changing table. Now I use this to separate items in the top drawer of my daughter's dresser. Not sorry I purchased it but I use differently then intended. It seems to be made well. It holds an entire small package newborn of diapers just fine with space for wipes. The side pockets are helpful for smaller items like diaper rash creams.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Love the organization!
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest of totes. BUT perfect for my use. I call it my “breastfeeding basket.” I cart it around everywhere I am so I have everything close to me while I nurse my newborn. Diapers, wipes, burp clothes, cream, lotion, water, etc! Love all of the pockets around the edge, too. Helps keep me organized and everything within reach.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Brodzik

customer_reviews.title: I can easily pick up and move to a different room
customer_reviews.text: This was on my "must have" list. It makes life with a newborn much easier to have everything together and organized. I can easily pick up and move to a different room. My dislikes on this... It stretches a bit and things don't stay straight on the inside, its flimsy. And the wipes container doesn't fit in correctly, it sits down low and makes the shape awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Storie

customer_reviews.title: cute but over priced
customer_reviews.text: This item is a lot smaller then I though it would be. I am keeping it because it matches my nursery, but honestly I think it is a bit over priced for what you get. There is nothing wrong with it. Its just not a good deal, since it is nothing more than a cloth basket...
customer_reviews.author: deal finder

customer_reviews.title: This Caddy has been doing great for me
customer_reviews.text: This Caddy has been doing great for me. it is very well put together and shows no signs of wear after everyday use and being lugged around everywhere. everything you could ever need fits into this with it many compartments/pockets. There are no cons i have found. i recommend this product to anyone. * My reviews are unbiased and truthful, as i depend on accurate and truthful reviews when making my purchases on Amazon. 9/28/16
customer_reviews.author: SarahMarie

customer_reviews.title: BUTTONS FALL OFF!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product just over 11 months and half of the buttons that hold the inner divider in place have fallen off, the other half are not far behind. I like the colors, capacity, and everything else about it, but next time I will purchase one with Velcro attachments or non removable dividers. NOT SAFE AROUND BABIES AND SMALL CHILDREN!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. life saver for us! So easy to carry everything we need for our baby. Threw whole thing in my suitcase (loaded with diapers and supplies) with my clothes on top so when we got to where we were going I just pulled it out and it was ready to go! Plus, moving it from room to room is so nice knowing we have everything in one basket. Only issue is it has tiny buttons to hold separators and one comes apart at times. No biggie just a little annoying sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a mobile changing station
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is great for a secondary changing station and on trips. We use it downstairs and have the changing table upstairs. When we don't want to take baby upstairs for a diaper change it's nice to have everything we need all in one place. I've also taken it to the vacation house and I was thankful that I packed it. It lays flat if needed so that made it easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the picture, design wise, but smaller and flimsier than I expected. It looks so small on my changing table. Not sure I will use it. Price seems a bit much for what it is. I think I might buy sturdy box pieces instead for the changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Suzin1

customer_reviews.title: Cute but center divider won’t stay dividing
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this caddy/organizer. The colors are great. Material is nice. Only major downfall is the divider refuses to stay attached! This is quite an issue for me as I’m carting this up and down stairs while taking care of my new baby. Was hoping it would be great but it’s sub par. I’m actively looking to replace currently
customer_reviews.author: Phnkygrl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and handy
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for a bunch of diapers and wipes! I put a full package of wipes in the horizontal compartment, then stacked the wipes dispenser on top of that since it was too big to fit all the way into the compartment otherwise, and the dispenser sits nicely flush with the top of the caddy for easy access. Cute design and it will be handy since our newborn won't have a proper changing table, so I can just bring the caddy to whatever room I'm in and change him there.
customer_reviews.author: KitVonDTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Dividers loops are so big that they do not hold on to buttons made for it
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sewn well, no thread coming out from anywhere Nice subtle color Side pockets to all 4 sides Cons: Dividers have loops to attach to the inside of caddy. The loops are so big that they do not hold on to buttons made for it. Not sturdy enough to hold a perfect rectangle shape. Not deep enough to fit in diapers completely
customer_reviews.author: Navin Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper Caddy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first-time mom, and these caddies are the best thing ever. I have a large pocket for stacking two packs of wipes, another for diapers, and use the third side for lotion and extra onesies in case of leaks and blowouts. The pockets on the sides are great for storing alcohol pads, diaper cream, Aquaphor, a thermometer, and gas-drops. I purchased two - one for the downstairs and one for the upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Road

customer_reviews.title: Just as shown!
customer_reviews.text: The center divider is removable and the sides are fabric so they are not sturdy when empty. That being said if you fill the caddy with diapers and bottles like I do then it is just fine. It is perfect for toting my 5 bottles, formula dispenser, diapers, and wipes plus a few other must haves at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is terrible. The dividers inside are attached by tiny buttons with large elastic loops so they constantly come undone. There is no structure to the thing unless it's full so it's really floppy. I would love to return but it's not worth a trip during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Came as pictured. It is cute so I don't mind leaving it in plain sight. Keeps diapers and wipes organized. The way we use it, it perfectly holds two rows of diapers and a container of wipes in the main compartment and there is still room in the side pockets for diaper paste or ointment that one might need. Easy to grab by the handles to bring to wherever you are changing baby, even if you already have the baby in your arms.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: We did not like this one, we purchased another caddy instead because this one is way too soft to hold things together. Unless you fill the caddy full, otherwise it's not steady.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Z.

customer_reviews.title: nice organizer
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned out the cabinet in my bathroom and used this to organize everything. Has plenty of pockets to hold a variety of things. Easy to pull out when getting ready in the mornings and put back before I leave so everything is left clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bland

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and fits diapers nicely and perfectly. Its great to organize the diapers and I have it right near my changing pad fits perfect on my dresser. Gives it a neat look to my baby changing area. The pockets make is easy to put in diaper rash creams or travel size baby products. It will get floppy over time as it stretches when you keep filling up but it happens. Totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot smaller then I has expected it's also kind of flimsy. It does have little dividers I've found they don't stay on very well. I do however like the fabric and pattern as well as the outside pockets I just wish their was something maybe a bottom liner to make it more sturdy. For the price it was not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: briena

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. Perfect to hold a good amount of diapers, a pack of wipes, and diaper cream and whatever else is handy to have nearby. I purchased this and a diaper mat and we use it almost exclusively to change the baby where ever we are hanging out in the house, might as well not even have the diaper changing table! Get this as a shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin1484

customer_reviews.title: This is a great caddy. I used it when I had my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great caddy. I used it when I had my baby as a method of transporting items from downstairs in our living room during the day, to upstairs in our bedroom at night. I was able to store pads, my pump, burp cloths, creams, wipes, diapers, etc very easily. It took me a few nights of rearranging things to get it all to fit nicely, and of course with the amount of items I had, I had to restock it daily. It's soft and flexible, while also maintaining high durability.
customer_reviews.author: Marony

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying baby supplies around the house (especially since ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my most used baby items! Great for carrying baby supplies around the house (especially since we have multiple floors). It is made out of cloth and the dividers in the inside are held in place by buttons. My only (minor) complaint is that the buttons come undone frequently and I have to readjust them often. Even with that, I would definitely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Melville

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of light use, the buttons which allow you to connect the dividers are coming off. Poorly made, cute but not worth the money. If it were cheaper I would see them back on myself, but for this price I'm just returning it.
customer_reviews.author: diane n

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My wife told me to get it. I dont see the point in it but she loves it so I guess its worth 5 stars. Just thebassembly was a pain. It was easier setting up my tv stand than it was getting this thing to work. The little buttons and tiny straps kept coming undone so I had to twist the straps tight THEN button it up.
customer_reviews.author: J-Bonez091391

customer_reviews.title: Inserts do not attach as designed
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy at all. The inserts would not stay buttoned no matter what I tried. I actually thought it was strange that the inserts were to be buttoned in place with very loose elastic loops instead of with Velcro. Ended up sending back as soon as I received it. Found a much better one with Velcro inserts that worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R Gartley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my wipes dispenser as shown in the pictures but that's not a big deal. I love how many pockets it has and how lightweight and portable it is. Material is good quality. Handles are very sturdy when I put lots of weight in to see how sturdy they were.
customer_reviews.author: xjeska7

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a few minutes ago and I already love it! It fits diapers, wipes, diaper rash ointment, changing pads, face wipes, nail clipper, nose frida, burp cloths, and still has room for more! The pockets and dividers are perfect size for everything and the handles make it so easy to bring this around the house with me, because let's face it when you're carrying a baby you don't have a lot of extra hands. I would definitely recommend this and might buy more for friends who also just had babies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find something better
customer_reviews.text: Inside part is not perminant and does not stay in place, barely even connects. It has little loops that are supposed to wrap around a tiny little button. I got it in once, didn’t even stay to put things in it the first time. Very disappointed. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. It is so convenient to carry around the house for diapering. We have a kid in size five diapers and one in size two and they fit in there perfectly with a full plastic pampers wipes containers. It's also great to have tubes of Aquaphor and saline. We took it on a road trip this weekend and it almost fit enough diapers for a two day trip. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A Handy Tool for Parents
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to keep baby supplies downstairs and not need to trek up and down the stairs. We also used it in a long road trip with the kids as well, it was a game changer. My husband and I both could locate items for both kids, it was easily accessible. Holds everything you need for a diaper change, nails, lotions, wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Clay & Kristen White

customer_reviews.title: but I thought this was a good investment
customer_reviews.text: This is mainly stationary for my downstairs area near the couch but I have used it when I traveled to the cabin and had to go upstairs and downstairs with this. It hold wipes and diapers plus holds everything else I need, cream, but spatula, clippers, lotion, etc. It's fabric so it may be a little flimsy so don't expect a rigid carrier, but I thought this was a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy and cheaply made for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it really isn’t great. I ordered it for the changing table to match some other decor I have. It’s VERY flimsy I’m hoping once I get stuff in it it will be a little better. It was almost impossible to hook the divider to the buttons which seem like they are going to fall off at any second while you’re trying to hook the divider to it. Overall I’m pretty disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than expected and the middle insert is ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than expected and the middle insert is hard to stay in. There are buttons attempting to hold some elastic loops but they don’t hold very well. Still a cute organizer though
customer_reviews.author: Lk

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sized. Well made. Definitely beige.
customer_reviews.text: Love this caddy! Fits everything I need, including my Ubbi wipe dispenser and plenty of size 3 diapers. We keep it in the living room and the color is more beige than gray. It looks just like the photo. Some reviews said it is gray, but mine is more of a beige like the photo, which I am happy about as that’s what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Barnett

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy, great size
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty convenient thing to have. I did think the sides would be a bit more sturdy when I bought it, they are a little flimsy, but it still functions well and the pattern is cute. The size is great for my newborn stuff as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not Great. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I would not order this again. In the photos it looks durable. However, it does not have great structure and tends to collapse. Maybe once the inserts are buttoned in and it’s full it will hold its shape better. It is very difficult to button the inserts into place as the elastic loops pop off the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: SteffyV

customer_reviews.title: WOW....it's tiny.
customer_reviews.text: This item is tiny. Like, just shorter and smaller overall than the pictures. It's not worth $17. Returning the item as it won't be useful since it holds baby doll sized items. Gave it 2 stars because it's cute, but very unpractical.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this caddy. I may purchase a second one for my pumping station. At first I thought the caddy was kind of flimsy but once you fill it up it worls just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Welch

customer_reviews.title: It is not huge but I wanted it to hold my items like hair spray
customer_reviews.text: The quality is outstanding. It is not huge but I wanted it to hold my items like hair spray, deodorant etc for the morning get ready regime. It holds everything and more. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice caddy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag, but I always try to cram way too much stuff in it. I would love to have a lid for it. Just a rectangle with slits for the handles to fit thru so everyone can't see all my junk!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful but has a chemical smell when opened
customer_reviews.text: Removing on star for smell and cardboard inserts. I personally think that baby stuff shouldn't have that chemical smell when opening so it can be used immediately without worry for the baby. I love the way it looks though - subtle and chic - perfect for my all white nursery
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying and flimsy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super flimsy, the inside constantly slides around. It's more so annoying then organized. I gave it a two stars because I am still currently using it and my baby is 10 weeks old. I just deal with the annoying insert. Plus the design is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Wiscogirl21

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought Two!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only caddy that seems to do the job. There is enough room for everything: wipes box, diapers, boogie wipes, extra clothes. And pockets to hold creams, comb, etc. We had one we kept upstairs and I bought a second to replace the basket I had downstairs. Nice soft material that is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This caddy did not disappoint..
customer_reviews.text: This caddy did not disappoint....it is roomy and has a lot of storage pockets. I have a tub of baby wipes, newborn and stage 1 diapers, thermometer, gas drops, body lotion, nail clippers, hair comb and brush as well as nasal aspirator stored in it but there is plenty room still left. The fabric is soft and easy to clean and the caddy is built pretty sturdy. It has a detachable T-shaped separator which is easily secured or removed using the three tiny buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Useful, nice pattern.
customer_reviews.text: A bit floppy and smallish, but great for this assembly of baby shower gifts. Has internal divider that gets buttoned in. Doesn't stay buttoned once you fill it up. Otherwise durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these and they have been great. Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they have been great. Very convenient. Box of buggies wipes fits well in one compartment and fill the other two with diapers. Little slit pockets on side are great for storing diaper cream, nasal aspiration, nail clippers, whatever. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this product, but it is definitely not sturdy. I like that I could throw it in the wash to get messes off. But it didn't hold my diaper items very well the sides bent over. And I had to wrap the straps around the buttons 3 or 4 times to get them to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Holds enough diapers and wipes to last more ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a diaper caddy. Works great. Holds enough diapers and wipes to last more than a day. Lots of pockets for creams, lotions, gripe water, gas drops....
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect caddy! Holds a ton of supplies! Easy to watch!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The handles are great for taking it from room to room too
customer_reviews.text: This has made keeping my daughter's diapers, rash cream, wipes and miscellaneous healthcare items together so much easier. It helps me stay organized which is sometimes hard with a baby. The handles are great for taking it from room to room too.
customer_reviews.author: teddy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a shower gift and filled it up with diapers and “essentials”. This gift was the hit of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra V

customer_reviews.title: Check your local stores
customer_reviews.text: I have this set in my living room for my sons diapers and wipes. This was the one thing I needed to have. It was kinda easy to set up once I figured out how to put the dividers in. I was upset when I saw the same product at Burlington for ten dollars
customer_reviews.author: xshellyb

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a boy or girl nursery
customer_reviews.text: This is able to store so many different things, but do so in a cute way. perfect for a boy or girl nursery. You can set it up for different compartments inside, or leave it one big open space. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaelynn

customer_reviews.title: It isn’t that sturdy and if you put a lot of items in ...
customer_reviews.text: Caddy is ok. It isn’t that sturdy and if you put a lot of items in it then it warps. Also the removable divider does not stay on well and is not properly sized as it is too big to fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Loves this little caddy very useful baby item especially if you dont always end up ...
customer_reviews.text: Loves this little caddy very useful baby item especially if you dont always end up using the changing table just grab the caddy and you have all the essentials for changing your baby in one portable carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: We love this item
customer_reviews.text: We love this item. It fits all of baby's diapers and wipes perfect. We love the outside pockets, too. They're great for diaper cream, aspirators, thermometer, etc. I'd definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy diapering organizer
customer_reviews.text: Easy diapering organizer to carry from room to room as needed. The three main compartments are great for diapers and wipes. The organizer pockets that surround the outside are wonderful for nail clippers, combs, ointments, thermometers, and all the other odds and ends. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty and it's great for storing diaper accessories downstairs for ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, but I guess that's my fault for not reading the details close enough. Other than that, it is pretty and it's great for storing diaper accessories downstairs for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Broke as soon as I set it up.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and it's sturdiness. But a button broke as soon as I tried to latch the strap for the dividers. Kind of diappointed in that. I guess I'll have to sew it back on. Another one of the buttons seems loose too, not sure how long it will hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a baby shower she loved it and actually went and bought another one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a baby shower she loved it and actually went and bought another one for upstairs. Super cute
customer_reviews.author: Channa Shelden

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, buttons need to be a little more secure
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but the dividers are held in place by small buttons, one of which has already popped off and we've only been using this for 7 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie O.

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of the bag and dividers but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the bag and dividers but the dividers connect with a small loop and buttons, which sometimes come undone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicho

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: A must have for a newborn. Bought this for my sisters baby shower and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Marinda

customer_reviews.title: Endless uses!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this basket, I use it for all my breastfeeding gear (pump parts, lanolin, handsfree bras, etc.) ordered a second one to use as a diaper caddy.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: OK product... a little flimsier tham hoped for
customer_reviews.text: This is ok- not as sturdy as another one that I purchased that has all hard sides. This has very little support on the sides. Also, it was a pain to get the buttons on to "assemble" it... seriously... why are the elastic holes for the buttons almost too small to even get them through?
customer_reviews.author: Smith115

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Using as a diaper caddy to carry around the house. Makes changing diapers super convenient. Only reason it isn’t 5 stars is because the separating insert is held by buttons that can come unhooked pretty easily so the separator isn’t held in place super well. Haven’t had to wash, but I imagine it might lose its shape a bit if gone through the machines.
customer_reviews.author: marcia jean watson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, it’s flimsy and doesn’t hold my items well
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, it’s flimsy and doesn’t hold my items well. The dividers on the inside always come undone. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Also works in the car
customer_reviews.text: Using for my new grandson to get diapers etc from one side of the house to the other. Works great. Also works in the car. 5 stars if it had a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Geez_yoy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute; purchased as a baby shower gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute; purchased as a baby shower gift and embellished with other items on the registry and to complete the look, wrapped it in white tulle and pink bow! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for keeping supplies downstairs for the new baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for keeping supplies downstairs for the new baby. I used it to put all my gifts in for baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: KJW100

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this organizer! It was purchased to go in a nursery, but could easily be used for organizing your crafts or other household items.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Steele

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: I keep this stocked on my kitchen island so I don't have to run upstairs every time to change a diaper. Just grab it, change the diaper and put it back. Very cute and lots of pockets for the gazillion baby items you use daily.
customer_reviews.author: MandaHrox

customer_reviews.title: So annoying!
customer_reviews.text: Whyyyyyyy did I not see any reviews about the maddening buttons that are used to attach the compartments? They keep coming undone and they’re hard to get attached! So annoying!
customer_reviews.author: brit

customer_reviews.title: Divider won’t stay hooked up
customer_reviews.text: The way the divider is hooked up is terrible. It won’t hold. Velcro would of been way better. I Wasn’t aware that’s not how the divider was hooked up. I’m returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i like it just wish it was a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: i like it but wish it was a little bigger. it's a little pricey for the size in my opinion but i'll keep it anyway cuz it'll make moving the baby stuff from one room to the next easy
customer_reviews.author: texangal

customer_reviews.title: Good product, can be better
customer_reviews.text: Good organizer. the compartments attach using the buttons inside the caddy but the loops keep coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Sonic

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I bought as a baby shower gift and the mom to be lived it so much she asked me where I got it and she ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a bit bigger but I must say I'm satisfied with the size, not too big not too small. You can fit everything you need and carry it from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile storage
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile storage for anywhere in the room - plus it looks cute enough to leave out on a shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Mom3103

customer_reviews.title: Love the chevron!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our pack and play. We have a two story house so we keep a pack and play with changing table on our main floor. This helps keep our changing station clean and organized!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyV123

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and sturdy, so based on that and the concept of the item, I gave it 5 stars, however I gave this as a gift along with some other baby gifts, so I don't know how it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Only 3 stars because it's not as sturdy as it looks on the image and also you have to attach buttons to make it stay and those buttons are really hard to put and make sure they stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe C.

product_meta.title: Trend Lab Dove Gray Chevron Storage, Nursery, Diaper Caddy - White/Gray
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteAdd organization to any area of your home with this Dove Gray portable Storage Caddy by Trend Lab. This lightly padded caddy features dove gray and white chevron stripes with a crisp white trim. Caddy has 8 outer pockets and a removable "T" separator for maximum versatility. Keep diapers, wipes and other necessities tidy while traveling from room to room. Caddy also functions as an organizer for crafts, picnics, pet supplies, etc. Measures 13 in x 9 in x 7 in. Coordinates with the Ombre Gray, Seashore Waves and Buttercup Zigzag collections by Trend Lab.
feature_bullets: Add organization to any area of your home with this Dove Gray portable Storage Caddy
Caddy has 8 outer pockets and a removable "T" separator for maximum versatility
Caddy also functions as an organizer for crafts, picnics, pet supplies, etc.
